name: Flag Catcher
overview: An entertaining little game. The Aim is to find the flag with limited moves created by Bryan Turnock of BSY. The soundtrack used in the game is "Turn It Into Love" by Stock Aitken Waterman (c) All Boys Music, adapted by BSY. Flag Catcher was written in six hours on May 6th 1992 using AMOS, Deluxe Paint III and Protracker V1.1, and was compiled using the AMOS compiler.
